summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 47, J.H. Nagle's Addition, being the alley from East Denny Way to East John Street, between North Broadway and Harvard Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9101 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
